name: Raishall
description:
On the longest night of the year, spirits that hunger for blood creep close to the veil that separates life from death.  If you disturb them, there is only one way it can end.

Raishall is a short interactive fiction piece created for Ectocomp 2019.

Category: La Petite Mort. (For games written in four hours or less.)

* The backgound colour can be set to black or white by using the settings button at the top of the game's page when running.
